name: Dice Trials
description:
Please post your scores in the comments below!

Tutorial:

To get started, roll a die by throwing it, or pressing E.

If you grab a die or touch it before it lands, the roll is cancelled.

When a die lands, special actions happen depending on the face.

 

Some rolls just give you points.

Some augment the points depending on your previous rolls.

And some give bonuses that change the game.

 

If you roll a face that has not yet been set, then you get to choose the face in the shop from a small selection. You can learn what the faces do by hovering over them, and clicking to select. If you don't like what you see, you can simply just re-roll the die to cancel the face setting.

 

Above the shop you'll see the point tally, which also has a history of all the points you have received recently.

 

There's a large timer on the wall, when that runs out, you move on to the next round. Each round you get a new die, and when you run out of rounds, the game ends.

 

Try to score the most amount of points possible, good luck.
